statements: SELECT * FROM training_data_sets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, data FROM training_data_sets WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, data, annotations FROM training_data_sets WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM training_data_sets WHERE data LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, data, annotations FROM training_data_sets WHERE annotations->>'label' = 'positive';
SELECT * FROM training_data_sets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT data, annotations FROM training_data_sets WHERE id > 5 AND data LIKE '%example%';
SELECT id, annotations, data FROM training_data_sets WHERE annotations->>'label' = 'positive' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_data_sets WHERE data ILIKE '%training%' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, jsonb_array_elements(annotations->'tags') AS tag FROM training_data_sets WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM training_data_sets;
SELECT id, data_set_name FROM training_data_sets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT data_set_description FROM training_data_sets ORDER BY data_set_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_data_sets WHERE data_set_name LIKE '%example%';
SELECT id, annotation_text FROM annotations WHERE data_set_id = 2 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_data_sets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT data_set_name, data_set_description FROM training_data_sets WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM annotations WHERE annotation_type = 'positive' ORDER BY annotation_text DESC;
SELECT annotations.annotation_text, training_data_sets.data_set_name FROM annotations INNER JOIN training_data_sets ON annotations.data_set_id = training_data_sets.id;
SELECT annotation_text FROM annotations WHERE data_set_id = 3 OR data_set_id = 4 ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, description FROM datasets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM datasets WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE dataset_id = 2;
SELECT id, annotation FROM annotations WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM datasets WHERE id = 3 OR id = 5 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM datasets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, description FROM datasets WHERE id = 2 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM annotations JOIN tasks ON annotations.dataset_id = tasks.dataset_id WHERE tasks.id = 3;
SELECT id, task_description FROM tasks WHERE dataset_id = 1 AND task_name LIKE 'Data%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM datasets WHERE source_url IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM datasets;
SELECT dataset_name, dataset_description FROM datasets;
SELECT annotation_text, label FROM annotations WHERE dataset_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_name LIKE 'C%';
SELECT ta.annotation_id, ta.annotation_text, ta.label, t.task_name FROM annotations ta JOIN task_annotations taas ON ta.annotation_id = taas.annotation_id JOIN tasks t ON taas.task_id = t.task_id;
SELECT * FROM datasets;
SELECT dataset_id, dataset_name FROM datasets WHERE dataset_id = 'a9448688-5d9d-4e2c-bfbe-e1be41a54511';
SELECT annotation_text, label FROM annotations JOIN datasets ON annotations.dataset_id = datasets.dataset_id;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM task_annotations JOIN tasks ON task_annotations.task_id = tasks.task_id JOIN annotations ON task_annotations.annotation_id = annotations.annotation_id;
SELECT * FROM training_data_sets;
SELECT id, data, task_type FROM training_data_sets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT task_name, description FROM tasks WHERE id = 3;
SELECT annotation, confidence FROM annotations WHERE confidence > 0.8;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_data_sets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT data, task_type FROM training_data_sets WHERE task_type = 'classification';
SELECT annotations.annotation, annotations.confidence, training_data_sets.data FROM annotations JOIN training_data_sets ON annotations.data_set_id = training_data_sets.id;
SELECT tasks.task_name, tasks.description, datasets.name FROM tasks JOIN datasets ON tasks.id = datasets.task_id;
SELECT users.username, users.email, datasets.source FROM users JOIN datasets ON users.id = datasets.id;
